text: Javier Revuelta (born 7 March 1957) is a Spanish equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Spain Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Valladolid
title: Javier Revuelta
